/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is devoid of any hustle and bustle, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the vibrant colors of the trees.
